name: Mo School - Official App by Govt of Odisha
description: Mo school app is the worlds first technology-led intervention to bring school, its current students, alumni, and staff together in a seamless way!  Using the app, a current student, for example, can seek career guidance for a particular area from a former student of the same school working in that area. A student can enquire about prospects in marine engineering from an alumnus working in the marine industry!  The Alumni can stay in touch with their school by getting updates about whats happening and contribute to their favorite causes at their school - be it running a scholarship in their mothers name or repairing their favorite playground - all from the comfort of their own home using this app!
